name: GLASS HOUSE
description:
An entry for LD42 and AGBIC2018. I missed the "running out of space" theme a little.

You need to collect enough money before the time ends, or your garden will be shut down!

Bring out your catalogue and start planting seeds! When they bloom into flowers, people will come to buy them. 

You can also harvest them to collect more seeds! The types of petal you use to make the seed will determine the outcome, so if you want a specific type, you should not mix.

Not enough space? Buy the lots next to you!
